overview: Sex is an art. The masters of erotica once again explore the sensual arts in their most erotic porn film to date. Witness couples creating a sensual platform for deeply intimate sex. Being in love is such a tender, exciting feeling and the Viv Thomas Crew bring these vivid emotions to the screen in an explosively intoxicating collection of passionate encounters. You won't believe how the Art of Sex will make you rethink your own personal exploration of sex!
title: The Art of Sex 2
